name: Promoted!
description:
Ignored for promotion for the last time, you force your way up the corporate ladder! 2D platformer, done in pixel art, chip tunes, Unity C#.

Liam Clarke : Programmer

Victor Nguyen : Programmer

Ian Nastajus : Programmer
